Proposition 27.  A reinforced weakly independent family of finite character defines a Prüfer ring of Krull type. 
Proof,  It will be sufficient to prove the proposition for a thin subfamily Q since this will still satisfy the conditions of the proposition.

w { a ) = min { w ( b ) ^ oc + d } = oc,  an4 w is well centred. 
ß is a weakly independent well centred family of finite character,  and we deduce by Propositions 5 and 8 that Л is a ring of Krull type.
